title: Movie House System
description: A web app that lets people book tickets and reserve seats for movies. Created during my internship at LogicBase Interactive.

title: Frontier
description: A mock space-themed website I coded in collaboration with a student web designer.

title: R.GG
description: A landing page created using the React framework. Inspired by the League of Legends website, U.GG

title: League Buddy
description: A website that uses the Data Dragon API from Riot Games to show information about a champion from League of Legends.

title: Mechanicall
description: A phone app that helps drivers on the road contact nearby mechanics if their car breaks down. Created for my college thesis.
